column1: '''Mrs. Maggot''' was the wife of the [[Farmer Maggot]]. Their home was the farm [[Bamfurlong]] and they had at least two sons and three daughters.

column4: Pippin]] when her husband hosted them. When the Farmer took the [[Hobbits]] to the Ferry, Mrs. Maggot sent with him a basket of [[mushrooms]] for Frodo, knowing how much he liked them.<ref name="mushroom">{{FR
